name: Comics Boss
description:
Comic's  Boss first and Formost This game was made  in 10 days (10th - 20th September) and its a submission for the Vimlark & 8 bits to infinity 2  Game jam With a requirement of a Boss and a theme of "On the edge", In this game, you are working on a comic book company and you're on the edge of being fired, to prove yourself you have to go throw the departments, and deliver the papers Good Luck and Have fun! Controls: -WASD to Walk  -Space to use / to fire Credits Game, Ideas & art - ItsF4llen

Music from (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdEEFrPBkT5WLeRCl2qsEJQ)
